result.execSummary:
The defendant Jason C Kukuris was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500) [Modifiers: Penalty - Retail Theft (<=$500), Penalty-Theft if Value <=$2500], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Restitution Stipulation in the total amount of $143.00
and Notice of Right to Seek Post Conviction Relief filed by defendant/counsel

1:17 P.M., Defendant Jason C Kukuris in court, in custody with attorney Amanda K. Riek.  Christine Marie Genda appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Rights/Elements, Defendant pleads no contest to Ct. 1, Judgment to be entered, Court sentences defendant to: 60 days jail w/Huber, consecutive to Dane County Cases 15 CM 2181 and 15 CM 2488, $443.00 costs due in 60 days or payment plan, defendant to submit DNA Sample, 12 days sentence credit, $143.00 Restitution, may transfer to Dane County, 1:24 P.M., Case recalled w/Atty Genda present at 1:32 P.M., State requesting warrant be quashed, Court quashes warrant, 1:33 P.M.
